channel.title: MoparScapers, Be My Alpha Testers
channel.description:
[size=12pt]Welcome friends, today, now actually, I finished the economical system of a game I've been working on since September. The game is meant to be sold so the name will not be provided in this topic. If possible sponsors Google the game before buying it and find that it has been playable, the "production value" decreases and as a result, I get less money.[/size]
[size=12pt]This game is written in AS3 for the Flash platform and is currently only available for the web Flash player. In the future, if success decides to be my friend, other platform releases will come out.[/size]
[size=12pt]Now, I'm sure you're thinking what is this guy saying? I'm saying that this game is 80% complete and that the testing fase has arrived.[/size]
[size=12pt]I need you guys to play my game, find bugs and post your score here.[/size]
[size=12pt]Let's brake that down, the game is almost stable and I still need to polish the game, make a soundtrack, make different backgrounds, activate some buttons,...[/size]
[size=12pt]But until starting that finishing touch, I want the game to be 100% stable.[/size]
[size=12pt]For it to be 100% stable, I need a good solid economical system.[/size]
[size=12pt]That is why I'm here. [/size]
[size=12pt]Anyone who participates to this alpha testing fase will get his name in the credit list (that has yet to be added) on the official release.[/size]
[size=12pt]It's simple, you visit this [url=http://www.vreg.comli.com/]URL[/url], play the game minimum 3 times, then post your total money, score and reached level here on MoparScape for each try.[/size]
[size=12pt]For example:[/size] [b]Try 1:[/b]
[b]Score: 120 000[/b] [b]Money: 9000[/b] [b]Level: 6[/b]
[b]Try 2:[/b]
[b]Score: 129 000[/b] [b]Money: 7000[/b] [b]Level: 8[/b]
[b]Try 3:[/b]
[b]Score: 120 900[/b] [b]Money: 9000[/b] [b]Level: 6[/b] [b]--------------[/b] [b]Favorite Weapon: AWP (telling me your favorite weapon is not a requirement)[/b] [b]Credit Name: Johnny (if you want to be listed as an alpha tester in the credit list, then post you're name as shown)[/b]
[size=12pt]3 gameplays is the minimum tries I need for having usable data. I need this data for knowing where to adjust the game's economy.[/size]
[size=12pt]The game has working highscores and I'm not stopping you from submitting your score (in the game).[/size] [size=12pt]But you should know that on the official release date, the highscores will be resetted.[/size]
[size=12pt]List of bugs:[/size]
[size=12pt]- Not really a bug, but I haven't activated the P button for pauzing the game. You can pauze the game with the GUI though.[/size]
[size=12pt]When looking for bugs, remember that these have to be bugs that are not normal for an UNFINISHED game.[/size] [size=2em][b]What game?[/b][/size]
[size=12pt]Let me answer that for you, you start as a little fish in the sea. There are other fish in the sea, larger and smaller than you. You have to eat the smaller fish and avoid getting eaten by bigger fish. When eating smaller fish, you grow, and eventually, you're able to eat fish that used to be bigger than you.[/size]
[size=12pt]There are 10 levels, each consisting of 3 minutes.[/size]
[size=12pt]Each level you're enemy fish get bigger and faster, making it harder for you to survive.[/size]
[size=12pt]You're goal is to get the highest score possible. When dieing early (before level 10) you still get to submit your score.[/size]
[size=12pt]Now here's the catch: as you eat fish, you gain money. By gaining money, you can buy WEAPONS: AK47, Desert Eagle, P90,...[/size]
[size=12pt]You can use those weapons to assist your fish in his battle of survival. If you get cornered by some big fish, you can blow them up with your guns, thus keeping your fish alive.[/size]
[size=24pt]- Open the how to play menu before playing the actual game![/size]
[size=24pt]- Here's the link to the game again: [url=http://vreg.comli.com/]http://vreg.comli.com/[/url][/size]
[size=24pt]Thanks to anyone who's entering the testing!!![/size]
[size=24pt]- If your screen stays grey, refresh the page and wait for 30 seconds.[/size]
[size=24pt]- If nothing works, upgrade your Flash player here: [url=http://get.adobe.com/nl/flashplayer/]http://get.adobe.com/nl/flashplayer/[/url][/size]

item.title: MoparScapers, Be My Alpha Testers
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:51, topic:424717”][quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=527379.msg3899041#msg3899041 date=1327596005]

Lumpy bump.
Still nothing?
[/quote]I’m going to release this (public) in about 6 or 7 days.

So you will make money that waY?[/quote]Yes I will. Mainly with ads, unless someone decides to sponsor the game within 4 days.

Unfortunately I didn’t have the patience to put the game up for 2 - 3 months to find a sponsor. So what I did was, I’ve put it in a special Quick Auction mode where possible sponsors have 15 days time to give me whatever bid they want, and the highest bid must be accepted or I’m not allowed to put the game up for bidding for another 4 months.

Of those 15 days, only 4 are left.

If I were not to find a sponsor in those 4 days, I’ll just release the game without any sponsors and all my revenue will be generated from ads.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScapers, Be My Alpha Testers
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:31, topic:424717”]I agree with Budda, you don’t need that much advertising to make a profit. Though I still don’t know why you’re bothering, people aren’t going to want to advertise for a game that:

a) Has the creators name in the title…? (I have personal experience with this one :|)
b) Isn’t popular (you’re going to need to have a portfolio first, a few games that brings activity to your site or whatever [and note people on the different gaming sites with a bunch of flash games don’t appreciate so many advertisements])

And nobody is going to want to play a game with that many advertisements as well.[/quote]I think you might be right, I should be reconsidering my amount of ads and the name of the game.

Any suggestions for a new name?

For the amount of ads, I’m going to ask some flash game veteran developers what they think.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScapers, Be My Alpha Testers
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I agree with Budda, you don’t need that much advertising to make a profit. Though I still don’t know why you’re bothering, people aren’t going to want to advertise for a game that:

a) Has the creators name in the title…? (I have personal experience with this one :|)
b) Isn’t popular (you’re going to need to have a portfolio first, a few games that brings activity to your site or whatever [and note people on the different gaming sites with a bunch of flash games don’t appreciate so many advertisements])

And nobody is going to want to play a game with that many advertisements as well.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScapers, Be My Alpha Testers
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9`, post:29, topic:424717”]First try: 119,000
Money: hadn’t bought a gun because it was before I discovered you could
Level: either 2 or 3

Second try: 9,000
Money: 20
Level: 1

There are some bugs and problems with this game. Sometimes the first level would just get skipped and it would throw me to the second level. There are too many pink fish to start with. Think about adding a sort of bar showing you your progress to the next “size” (how much you need to grow in order to eat bigger fish). The guns and HUD hide the fish going by.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tcI_6LNVFA0[/youtube][/quote]You need to update your Flash player, that is what’s causing all those bugs. Thanks for your report

EDIT: Would you mind trying again after upgrading your Flash player and telling me your opinion then?

You actually grow every time you eat a single fish.

It seems like a lot of you have an older version of the Flash player, so I’m currently porting this over to and older Flash player.

EDIT 2: A new version is uploaded and optimized for Flash player 10 and higher. This should fix all of the bugs without having to upgrade the Flash player.

EDIT 3: Too many pink fish as in the game is too hard?

EDIT 4: Some more bugs fixed:

  • After ex. dieing, the level timer did not get resetted, thus for those dieing at the end of a level, then hitting ‘Play Game’, the next level loaded after ex. 5 seconds. That’s fixed now.

  • When your fish was turned right at the end of a level, the controls on the next level got messed up. That’s fixed now.

Read full topic
